text: I feel tired and drained even after getting enough sleep instead of feeling refreshed.
I lose interest in activities I used to enjoy instead of maintaining enthusiasm.
I feel hopeful about the future instead of feeling pessimistic.
I have difficulty concentrating on tasks instead of staying focused.
I feel worthless or guilty about things instead of maintaining self-worth.
I experience changes in appetite or weight instead of maintaining stable eating habits.
I feel restless or slowed down instead of maintaining normal energy levels.
I have trouble sleeping or sleep too much instead of maintaining regular sleep patterns.
I feel sad or empty most of the time instead of experiencing a range of emotions.
I find it hard to make decisions instead of feeling confident in my choices.
I feel energetic and motivated instead of feeling drained.
I withdraw from social activities instead of maintaining connections with others.
I have thoughts of self-harm or suicide instead of feeling safe and secure.
I feel pleasure and satisfaction from daily activities instead of feeling numb.
I experience physical symptoms like headaches or body aches instead of feeling physically well.
I feel optimistic about my life instead of feeling hopeless.
I have difficulty remembering things instead of maintaining clear memory.
I feel irritable or angry over small matters instead of maintaining emotional balance.
I feel connected to others and supported instead of feeling isolated.
I feel like my mood is quietly collapsing instead of feeling stable and balanced.
